item.description:
Enjoy a scrumptious family style Thai meal at the well-known Amarin Restaurant at Newton Corner. Total cost including soup, rice, non-alcoholic drink, entrée, tax and tip is estimated to be a mere $20.00! Pay in cash or check to Don Pouliot. Pay separately for beer or wine. Liquor is not included. Entrees to be served family style include selections such a: Pad Tai, Shrimp Himpain, Chicken Curry, Beef with Broccoli and more.

Event is limited to 15 people to facilitate friendly conversation.

PAYPAL is not accepted at this event!

Directions: Take the Mass Pike to Newton exit 17 and head towards Watertown. Take an immediate left on to Pearl Street to park at the free parking lot behind the restaurant.

Call or email Don Pouliot 617-840-3077 (djpouliot@gmail.com) with your RSVP by Sunday June 17th.
item.name: A repeat of a popular "Dine Around"
